# popup

**Type Property**

A dictionary or annotation object that specifies the annotation to pop up for text entry or editing.

## Declaration

```swift
static let popup: PDFAnnotationKey
```

## Configuring Pop-Up Annotations

- **open**: A Boolean value that specifies whether the pop-up is in an opened state, showing its text content, or in a closed state and showing an icon.

items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the pop-up is in an opened state, showing its text content, or in a closed state and showing an icon.
